name: rune
description: Multi-agent engineering orchestration for Claude Code. Plan, work, review, and audit with Agent Teams. Includes 19 review agents, 5 research agents, 8 investigation agents, 9 utility agents, 2 work agents, 12 commands, and 14 skills. BMAD-derived elicitation methods for structured reasoning. Multi-language quality guidance (Python, TypeScript, Rust).
